pull_requests.title: BIP3: drop optional License Code header
pull_requests.body:
based on @real-or-random's https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/pull/1892#issuecomment-3051961323.

Also a couple of minor BIP3 touch-ups.

comment_list.body: Updated to take all the review feedback (thanks!).

pull_requests.title: BIP32: edits by ddustin for clarity
pull_requests.body: Picks up @ddustin's work in https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/pull/785, updated with the latest reviewers' feedback.

comment_list.body: @sipa: Could you take another look at these few lines?

pull_requests.title: BIP352: be explicit for the input_hash corner case
pull_requests.body: While this is statistically improbable, e.g., we don't yet know of a hash preimage that results in an output = 0 or greater than the curve order, we still want to be explicit on how to handle this (same as we do for the tweaks themselves).
